sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import {AiFillHome} from 'react-icons/ai'
import {HiFire} from 'react-icons/hi'
import {CgPlayListAdd} from 'react-icons/cg'
import {SiYoutubegaming} from 'react-icons/si'

const NxtThemeContext = React.createContext({
  isDarkTheme: false,
  toggleTheme: () => {},
  sideNavList: [
    {id: 1, logo: AiFillHome, path: '/', text: 'Home', active: true},
    {id: 2, logo: HiFire, path: '/', text: 'Trending', active: false},
    {id: 3, logo: SiYoutubegaming, path: '/', text: 'Gaming', active: false},
    {id: 4,
    logo: CgPlayListAdd,
      path: '/',
      text: 'Saved Videos',
      active: false,
    },
  ],
  savedVideos: [],
  addToSavedVideos: () => {},
})

export default NxtThemeContext
